short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mailpengu uses AI to customize outgoing sales presentations with just a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
< This is the official Google Chrome Extenstion for Mailpengu.com >

What is Mailpengu?
Mailpengu is a Google Chrome Extension that adds a button to Gmail that let's you add a customized sales presentation with just a single click.

Save 50% time with every sales presentation you send.

1) Add Recipient Information
Thanks to AI, instantly add recipient name, company description and company logo to your presentation.

2) Track Presentation Links
Get notified whenever someone clicks a link inside your presentation.

3) Watermark
Add invisible watermarks to your presentation to protect against unauthorized use.

Mailpengu is the perfect tool for sales managers who send presentations via email.
